member.name: IWizardExtension.AddPages
member.summary: Adds extension pages to the wizard by filling an array with handles to structures representing those pages.
member.param: A pointer to an array of handles that represent the wizard dialog pages. Handles to PROPSHEETPAGE structures for the extension pages are added to this array.
The count of elements in aPages.
The count of handles successfully added.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWizardExtension.GetFirstPage
member.summary: Gets a handle to the first page of the wizard extension.
member.param: A pointer to a handle representing the first page of any wizard extension pages.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWizardExtension.GetLastPage
member.summary: Gets a handle to the final page of the wizard extension pages.
member.param: A pointer to a handle representing the wizard extension's final page.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IWizardExtension
member.summary: Used by wizards such as the Web Publishing Wizard and Online Print Ordering Wizard which host server-side content pages. This interface exposes methods to specify supported extension pages and to navigate into and out of those pages.
